content:
On Wednsday March 15th, Pieter Libin of the AI lab Brussels successfully defended his PhD on how RL can be applied to learn prevention strategies to fight infectious diseases. Find out more at: https://ai.vub.ac.be/team/pieter-libin/ and https://today.vub.be/en/article/how-artificial-intelligence-can-support-decision-makers-in-mitigating-epidemics

Pieter Libin
The public PhD defense Guiding the mitigation of epidemics with reinforcement learning will take place online on Wednesday, April 15, 2020 at 13:00 CET. It will be broadcasted live on YouTube. Click here to access the stream.
How artificial intelligence can support decision makers in mitigating epidemics | VUB Today
Andere VUB websites
